ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Fixed occasional Ajax network error occurring on IE - Fixed synchronization issue in controlling modules (InterfaceControl) that could have caused commands not being executed if performed too fastly - Added zoom/panning to statistic graphs - Added forecast info to Weather Underground widget - Added new Timetable app for scheduling Lights, Shutters, Thermostats - Fixed security widget slider size - Added X10 CM15 RF messages decoding - Fixed bug in ZWaveLib Basic Report command (bug introduced with latest refactoring)
